Description: Six international freight forwarders agreed to plead guilty and to pay criminal fines totaling $50.27 million for their roles in several conspiracies to fix a variety of fees and charges in connection with the provision of freight forwarding services for international air cargo shipments.

Notes: Description field shows type of discrimination that EEOC had alleged.
